alert.note: Alert for Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Northwest Providence; Southeast Providence; Washington; Western Kent (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 8:50AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Heavy rains will impact portions of central Bristol, northeastern Washington, northeastern Newport, eastern Kent, eastern Providence and Bristol Counties through 1015 AM EDT... At 848 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Preston, or near Jewett City, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas near Providence and Fall River. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of heavy rainfall are forecast to continue this morning and afternoon. If prolonged heavy rainfall rates continue to occur over these areas, a flash flood warning may be issued. Locations impacted include... Providence, Fall River, Warwick, Cranston, Pawtucket, Taunton, East Providence, Woonsocket, Coventry, Dartmouth, Cumberland, North Providence, West Warwick, Johnston, North Attleborough, North Kingstown, Bristol, Attleboro, Smithfield and Lincoln. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams. This storm may intensify and become severe. Stay tuned to your local media for updates and possible warnings.

area.areaDesc: Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Northwest Providence; Southeast Providence; Washington; Western Kent
